name: bbn\Appui\Masks

count.name: count
count.comments:
/**
   * Count masks.
   *
   * @param int|null $id_type Type ID.
   * @return int Count of masks.
   */

get.name: get
get.comments:
/**
   * Get a mask by ID.
   *
   * @param string $id Mask ID.
   * @param bool $simple Return simple data.
   * @return array|null Mask data.
   */

getAll.name: getAll
getAll.comments:
/**
   * Get all masks.
   *
   * @param int|null $id_type Type ID.
   * @param bool $simple Return simple data.
   * @return array Masks data.
   */

getTextValue.name: getTextValue
getTextValue.summary: Get text value for a type.

doc.description: Get text value for a type.

getTextValue.comments:
/**
   * Get text value for a type.
   *
   * @param int $id_type Type ID.
   * @param bool $fulltext Return full text.
   * @return array|null Text value.
   */

getDefault.name: getDefault
getDefault.summary: Get default mask for a type.

doc.description: Get default mask for a type.

getDefault.comments:
/**
   * Get default mask for a type.
   *
   * @param int $id_type Type ID.
   * @return array|null Default mask data.
   */

setDefault.name: setDefault
setDefault.summary: Set default mask for a type.

doc.description: Set default mask for a type.

setDefault.comments:
/**
   * Set default mask for a type.
   *
   * @param int $id_note Mask ID.
   * @return int|bool Result of update operation.
   */

insert.name: insert
insert.comments:
/**
   * Insert a new mask.
   *
   * @param string $name Mask name.
   * @param int $id_type Type ID.
   * @param string $title Mask title.
   * @param string $content Mask content.
   * @return string|null ID of the inserted mask.
   */

update.name: update
update.comments:
/**
   * Update a mask.
   *
   * @param array $cfg Mask data.
   * @return bool Result of update operation.
   */

delete.name: delete
delete.comments:
/**
   * Delete a mask.
   *
   * @param int $id_note Mask ID.
   * @return bool Result of delete operation.
   */

render.name: render
render.comments:
/**
   * Render a mask.
   *
   * @param string $note Mask ID or data.
   * @param array $data Data to render with.
   * @return string|null Rendered mask content.
   */
